Sonos Era 100 and Era 300 review: The next generation of great, reliable multi-room sound.

Adithyakrishnan 2023-04-06 19:45

Sonos once again earns its reputation for its great sound quality and design. Sonos has two new speakers launching on Tuesday, March 28, and they are both significant new models that occupy a couple of key spots in the overall Sonos line-up
